mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart_tbl c USING dual ON (c.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id} and c.pro_num = #{pro_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET c.cart_amount = c.cart_amount + #{cart_amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( cart_code, pro_num, mbsp_id, cart_amount ) VALUES ( seq_cart_code.nextval, #{pro_num}, #{mbsp_id}, #{cart_amount} )
